message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13000. It's a great deal, and I know you'll appreciate its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I value the product at more than $10000, I'm willing to come down to $11500.  This price reflects the value you'll receive and allows me to make a fair profit. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $11000 for the product. I'm really interested in it, and I think that's a fair price for both of us.
